Html: I noticed an automatically imported setup from battle.net gives focus magic to an arcane mage. That seems to imply it's the focus magic from the same mage. If it's true, how should a focus magic from another mage be given? Or is it simply implied and the one listed is supposed to be from another mage? (making the listing of it by default probably incorrect)

Focus Magic that you give is controlled in the options by setting the normalized crit rate of the target you put it on (this is enabled by default). To get Focus Magic from someone else you set the in the buffs tab (this is disabled by default).

OK, then I noticed incorrect [or at least sketchy] behavior since I get Focus Magic on the buffs list after starting on a clean Rawr and importing from battle.net. Let me know if I should make a bug report for it. [edit: I made a report since this may not be read]
